descriptionHtml:
Nightmares Soul Edge Sword

Due to several requests I have begun working again on my original nightmare soul edge sword.

Latest Changes:

Overhaul of the mesh to include an animated eye
Custom Collision 
Added sword location - can be found in Silent Moon Camp for those that do not have Daedric Smithing.

Nightmares Sould Edge is 2 handed, Smith-able and can be Tempered 
Comes pre-enchanted with Soul Trap and Life Steal

Please note that this is a work in progress. Texture still needs more work which will come at a later date. 




Credits:
This guy (sniperdusk) and his wicked cos play soul edge http://sniperdusk.deviantart.com/art/Soul-Edge-17020735
~mage--of--breath and his red eye texture http://mage--of--breath.deviantart.com/art/red-eye-texture-243828679
author: thumper84
